<abstract>
 <para>This chapter provides you a comprehensive view about applications in Collaboration, including:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Portlets">Portlets</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Provision of a list of all porlets used in Collaboration. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Gadgets">Gadgets</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Provision of a list of all gadgets used in Collaboration.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
  <para>These applications are packaged as Web application archives (WARs).
  </para>
  <para>Also, you can specify the package of each portlet and gadget and its available preferences that allow you to extend the configuration choices for standard preferences.
  </para>
	</abstract>
